title: Data Structures Final Project
description: Design and implement a binary search tree with full CRUD operations. Your solution should include proper error handling, unit tests, and documentation. The project must demonstrate understanding of tree traversal algorithms and time complexity analysis.

title: Database Design Assignment
description: Create a normalized database schema for an e-commerce platform. Include entity-relationship diagrams, table definitions with proper constraints, and sample queries demonstrating complex joins and aggregations.

title: Calculus Problem Set 7
description: Complete problems 1-20 from Chapter 8. Show all work for partial derivatives and multiple integrals. Pay special attention to problems involving Green's theorem and vector field analysis.

title: Physics Lab Report
description: Analyze the experimental data from the pendulum motion experiment. Calculate the gravitational constant and compare with theoretical values. Include error analysis and discussion of measurement uncertainties.

title: Essay: Modern Art Movements
description: Write a 2000-word essay analyzing the influence of Impressionism on contemporary digital art. Include at least 8 scholarly sources and proper MLA formatting. Focus on the transition from traditional to digital mediums.

title: Machine Learning Homework 4
description: Implement a neural network from scratch using only NumPy. Train on the provided dataset and achieve at least 85% accuracy. Submit both code and a detailed report explaining your architecture choices and optimization techniques.
